DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Data OMOP CDM Condition Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._A foreign key that refers to a Standard Condition Concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies.
